item.title: AR, the Future of our History
item.description: AR, the Future of our History Spatial computing and the “AR cloud” is the future of humanity’s history. I’ll let you know why with a quick story. My lineage and family history is a tangled web of intrigue, fascination, and wonder. I’ve got rootsgoing back to Ashanti Royalty, yet when I try to tap my family diaspora to share stories of our history, there are only fragments. This is unfortunate.

item.title: Augmented Reality's 6th Sense
item.description: This updated article now lives on Medium “Does AR give us a sixth sense?“ - https://link.medium.com/upEkfPnRST Does AR give us a 6th sense? Augmented Reality (AR) is the mixture of the real world and virtual worlds so that one understands the other. The medium affords a deeper connection with the real world giving context without breaking its laws. What makes AR a powerful medium is that it even supersedes our visual senses.
